articles.title: Judge says FTC investigation into Media Matters ‘should alarm all Americans’
articles.description: A federal judge has blocked the FTC's investigation into Media Matters research around advertising and antisemitic content on X.
articles.author: Anthony Ha

articles.title: AI-powered stuffed animals are coming for your kids
articles.description: Do A.I. chatbots packaged inside cute-looking plushies offer a viable alternative to screen time for kids? Maybe not.
articles.author: Anthony Ha

articles.title: Anthropic says some Claude models can now end ‘harmful or abusive’ conversations
articles.description: Anthropic says new capabilities allow its latest AI models to protect themselves by ending abusive conversations.
articles.author: Anthony Ha

articles.title: Winklevoss twins’ crypto company Gemini files for IPO
articles.description: Another crypto company is headed for the public markets.
articles.author: Kirsten Korosec
